content:
Based on the execution logs, I'll create a comprehensive report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System (around position 41,-85)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill facing DOWN at (41,-85)
- Burner inserter at (42.5,-83.5) moving coal to wooden chest
- Wooden chest at (43.5,-83.5) storing coal

### Iron Processing System 1 (around position -20,-54)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill facing RIGHT at (-20,-54)
- Burner inserter at (-18.5,-53.5)
- Stone furnace at (-17,-52)
- Output inserter at (-16.5,-50.5)
- Storage chest at (-16.5,-49.5) containing iron plates

### Iron Processing System 2 (around position -14,-56)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill facing RIGHT at (-14,-56)
- Burner inserter at (-12.5,-55.5)
- Stone furnace at (-11,-54)
- Output inserter at (-10.5,-52.5)
- Storage chest at (-10.5,-51.5) containing iron plates

### Iron Processing System 3 (around position -6,-57)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill facing RIGHT at (-6,-57)
- Burner inserter at (-4.5,-56.5)
- Stone furnace at (-3,-56)
- Output inserter at (-2.5,-54.5)
- Storage chest at (-2.5,-53.5) containing iron plates

ERROR TIPS

### Output Blockage Issues
- Ensure there is proper space for output items before they are dropped
- Clean blocked outputs regularly to prevent system stalling
- Verify inserter drop positions align with target entity input positions

### Entity Alignment Issues
- Double check inserter pickup and drop positions match with connected entities
- When rebuilding systems, ensure all components are properly aligned in the processing chain
- Pay attention to entity facing directions when placing new structures

### Fuel Management
- Keep consistent fuel levels across all burner entities
- Monitor fuel levels in inserters and drills to prevent system stoppage
- Implement regular refueling cycles for all burner entities

### Variable Reference Errors
- Define all variables before use
- Verify variable names are correct and in scope
- Pay attention to proper variable initialization

NAMESPACE

Functions:
- None defined in the provided logs

Important Variables:
- None explicitly defined in the provided logs

The systems appear to be functional but experiencing some alignment and blockage issues that are being actively addressed through rebuilding and repositioning of components.
